problem_names:
theorem preservation:
  assumes "\<turnstile>_i s;vs;es : ts"
          "\<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>"
  shows "\<turnstile>_i s';vs';es' : ts"

theorem progress:
  assumes "\<turnstile>_i s;vs;es : ts"
  shows "const_list es \<or> es = [Trap] \<or> (\<exists>a s' vs' es'. \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)"
translations:
theorem preservation:
  assumes "\<turnstile>_i s;vs;es : ts"
          "\<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>"
  shows "\<turnstile>_i s';vs';es' : ts"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts
obtain \<S> where "store_typing s \<S>" "\<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_i vs;es : ts"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<S>.
        \<lbrakk>store_typing s \<S>;
         \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms(1) config_typing.simps

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<turnstile>_ i s;vs;es : ts
  \<turnstile>_ ?a1.0 ?a2.0;?a3.0;?a4.0 : ?a5.0 =
  (\<exists>s \<S> i vs es ts.
      ?a1.0 = i \<and>
      ?a2.0 = s \<and>
      ?a3.0 = vs \<and>
      ?a4.0 = es \<and>
      ?a5.0 = ts \<and>
      store_typing s \<S> \<and>
      \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<S>.
        \<lbrakk>store_typing s \<S>;
         \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  store_typing s \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts
hence "store_typing s' \<S>" "\<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_i vs';es' : ts"

proof (prove)
using this:
  store_typing s \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. store_typing s' \<S> &&& \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs';es' : ts
using assms(2) store_preserved types_preserved_e
by simp_all

proof (state)
this:
  store_typing s' \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs';es' : ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  store_typing s' \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs';es' : ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts
using config_typing.intros

proof (prove)
using this:
  store_typing s' \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs';es' : ts
  \<lbrakk>store_typing ?s ?\<S>;
   ?\<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ ?i ?vs;?es : ?ts\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<turnstile>_ ?i ?s;?vs;?es : ?ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<turnstile>_ i s';vs';es' : ts

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

theorem progress:
  assumes "\<turnstile>_i s;vs;es : ts"
  shows "const_list es \<or> es = [Trap] \<or> (\<exists>a s' vs' es'. \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. const_list es \<or>
    es = [Trap] \<or>
    (\<exists>a s' vs' es'.
        \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. const_list es \<or>
    es = [Trap] \<or>
    (\<exists>a s' vs' es'.
        \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)
obtain \<S> where "store_typing s \<S>" "\<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_i vs;es : ts"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<S>.
        \<lbrakk>store_typing s \<S>;
         \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms config_typing.simps

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<turnstile>_ i s;vs;es : ts
  \<turnstile>_ ?a1.0 ?a2.0;?a3.0;?a4.0 : ?a5.0 =
  (\<exists>s \<S> i vs es ts.
      ?a1.0 = i \<and>
      ?a2.0 = s \<and>
      ?a3.0 = vs \<and>
      ?a4.0 = es \<and>
      ?a5.0 = ts \<and>
      store_typing s \<S> \<and>
      \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>\<S>.
        \<lbrakk>store_typing s \<S>;
         \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  store_typing s \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. const_list es \<or>
    es = [Trap] \<or>
    (\<exists>a s' vs' es'.
        \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  store_typing s \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. const_list es \<or>
    es = [Trap] \<or>
    (\<exists>a s' vs' es'.
        \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)
using progress_e3

proof (prove)
using this:
  store_typing s \<S>
  \<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ i vs;es : ts
  \<lbrakk>?\<S>\<bullet>None \<tturnstile>_ ?i ?vs;?cs_es : ?ts';
   ?cs_es \<noteq> [Trap]; \<not> const_list ?cs_es;
   store_typing ?s ?\<S>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>a s' vs' es'.
                       \<lparr>?s;?vs;?cs_es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ ?i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. const_list es \<or>
    es = [Trap] \<or>
    (\<exists>a s' vs' es'.
        \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  const_list es \<or>
  es = [Trap] \<or>
  (\<exists>a s' vs' es'.
      \<lparr>s;vs;es\<rparr> \<leadsto>_ i \<lparr>s';vs';es'\<rparr>)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
